rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with integrated storage and accessibility ramps.
Spacious area for socializing, incorporating traditional Chettinad elements like carved wood detailing; Vastu compliant orientation (southeastern direction) to promote positive energy.
Modern kitchen design with integrated island counter, designed for wheelchair accessibility and aligned in the east for auspiciousness as per Vastu principles.
Spacious primary bedroom featuring a balcony with view towards the north-east; designed with wheelchair access and Chettinad architectural motifs.
Secondary bedroom with an accessible design and adjoining balcony facing east for positive energy as per Vastu.
Accessible bathroom with safety features; centrally located to serve the living space.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance door designed for ease of movement.
Doors providing access from primary and guest bedrooms to their respective balconies.
Multiple windows placed strategically for natural lighting and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
